data.title: Louisville Free Public Library
data.text:
Try something new...

MyLibraryU

Short Courses and Fast Classes taught by university professors and field experts.

COLLIDER

South Central Regional Library's artist-in-residence program, COLLIDER, connects the public with art and the people who create it.

Kitkeeper

Interested in checking out a Book Discussion Kit for your class or book group? Try KitKeeper.

Online Learning

Access online learning platforms, including LinkedIn Learning, Treehouse, Transparent Language, The Great Courses on hoopla, and more.
